# Gene plots

```{r deg_plot}
# These plots are sorted by gene ID and show DEGs in both directions
degPlot(dds, res = res, n = 9, xs = "category", log2 = TRUE)
```

```{r plot_gene}
plotGene(
    bcb,
    genes = resTbl$degLFCUp$ensgene[1:4],
    normalized = "tpm",
    gene2symbol = gene2symbol(bcb),
    interestingGroups = "category")
```
